entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
